item.description:
Okay, let's try this again! Hopefully the weather will cooperate with us this time  

Saturdays from 8pm - 11pm the Naval base's Seaview Lanes has Xtreme bowling, also called Cosmic or Disco bowling at other places, so come join us for bowling under the black lights and DJ!

The cost is:

$3.50 per person per game + $2.50 for shoes.

They have a bar, gaming area for kids, a full kitchen and TV's.  Full disclosure, I'm TERRIBLE at bowling, but always have a ton of fun doing it.  Don't worry about coming by yourself, most of us do to these meetups.  You'll find the group very welcoming and friendly.

Civilians are welcome at Seaview lanes, but do need a way to get on base - which for now is me, maybe another member with military access will sign up too.  We'll meet to carpool at the Newport Mall parking lot, near JT Connell Hwy across from Stop-n-Shop (note: not next to Stop-n-Shop, but perpendicularly across the parking lot from it, in the little lot between the gas station and the sign- hopefully will make sense when you see it). I'll be in my red Mini Cooper - I don't have snow tires, so if it's snowy or icy ride at your own risk, lol.  I can take myself plus 3 other people.

Please text me when you get to the parking lot so I know you need a ride! My cell number is (734) 891-7806.

Depending on how many people RSVP, it might take me multiple trips to get everyone from the parking lot to base. So if you get to the parking lot and don't see us don't worry, we might be driving, but I will text you back as soon as I can. I'll start bringing people over at 7:45.  The first group please snag us some lanes and beer!

If you can get on base, the address for the bowling alley is:

Seaview Lanes Bowling Center
Location: Building 656, Whipple Street

Better yet, if you're able to get on base and carpool others, please email me so you and I can coordinate - that way I don't spend the night bringing people back and forth.

As always, please actually RSVP if you plan on coming and attend if you RSVP.  Your hosts greatly appreciate that.

IMPORTANT - if fewer than 4 people have RSVP'd by 3pm that day, I will cancel the meetup, so if you RSVP'd yes, please check to see if it's happening before you head over, and if you RSVP, please show up. As always, please keep your RSVP up to date so we know how many people to look for.

This is going to be fun!  Let me know if you have any other questions.

~Erinn

p.s. - Someone asked if the bowling alley does party packages. They do, but I found out it involves me giving them a guaranteed head count, me paying for the total count up front and me giving them my credit card for any incidentals....just easier if we all pay separately
item.how_to_find_us: Park near JT Connell Hwy across from Stop n Shop, I'll be in Mini Cooper, red w/black stripes
item.name: Xtreme Bowling at Seaview Lanes - Naval Base! *)
